document.full_text: morgan stanley , goldman sachs  and jpmorgan chase & co  will soon join citigroup  and bank of america corp  in allowing shareholders to vote on executive compensation, the wall street journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.
document.title: morgan stanley, goldman to recommend "say on pay": report
lines_and_colors: morgan stanley , goldman sachs  and jpmorgan chase & co  will soon join citigroup  and bank of america corp  in allowing shareholders to vote on executive compensation, the wall street journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.
